changelog.change: Changed the MainManager pointer path to be more reliable...AGAIN
Simplified the start split logic
Changed the MainManager pointer path to be more reliable
Attempted a fix for the start split not triggering properly
Added an Enter Snakemouth split
Added an Enter Bandit Hideout Storage Room split
Added an Enter Rubber Prison split
Added an Enter Fridge Outside split
Fixed all splits requiring enemies by properly updated the old enemy encounter information (this fixes the Gen & Eri split triggering too early)
Added logs for the start and end split logic, the log file will be located in the LiveSplit's Components folder.
Added support for two any% sepecifc splits: broodmother and enter fridge.

Changed the label in the settings from the "Glitchless" mode to the "Select Splits" mode. This mode allows to select splits from EITHER glitchless OR any%, please update your splits settings accordingly when running either category.
Fixed an issue with the end split not triggering
Fixed the room check of the ch4 enter treasure room split
Fixed an issue where reload save can break the enemy defeated check
Reverted the timing of ALL splits to those of 1.0.3
Added a new mid split logic check: enemyencounter which will check when enemies are defeated and split on the next battle end
Reverted the timing of splits to those of 1.0.3 with the exception of Gen Eri rescue and Malbee rescue
Added a lot of protection against missreads of the game memory since the LiveSplit API is stinky and smelly
Fixed the Requesting Assistance split logic
Added a text with the version number to the settings window
Completely change the post battle splits check, timing and name
Trying a fix for logic to determine that a battle has been won...AGAIN
Fixed some typos in the splits name
Fixed the logic to determine that a battle has been won
Fixed the prefix pointer path
Fixed the settings UI being too large in height
Initial Release
